@graph.title: Extreme Value Theory-Based Methods for Visual Recognition
@graph.abstract: Preface -- Acknowledgments -- Figure Credits -- Extrema and Visual Recognition -- An Alternative to Central Tendency Modeling -- Background -- Extreme Value Theory for Recognition -- Decision Making in Machine Learning -- Organization -- A Brief Introduction to Statistical Extreme Value Theory -- Basic Concepts -- The Extreme Value Theorem -- Distributions in the EVT Family -- Gumbel Distribution -- Fréchet Distribution -- Weibull Distribution -- Generalized Extreme Value Distribution -- Rayleigh Distribution -- Generalized Pareto Distribution -- Tail Size Estimation -- The i.i.d.
